item.title: Remnant 2 Toolkit
item.description: Remnant 2 build creator, build search, item tracking, item database, and more!

item.title: Item Tracker - Remnant 2 Toolkit
item.description: Track your discovered and undiscovered items. Supports save file importing!

item.title: Community Builds - Remnant 2 Toolkit
item.description: Search a collection of builds submitted and ranked by the community.

item.title: Featured Builds - Remnant 2 Toolkit
item.description: A curated list of unique and high-quality community submitted builds.

item.title: Boss Tracker - Remnant 2 Toolkit
item.description: A running log of all additions, changes, and fixes to the toolkit.

item.title: Item Lookup - Remnant 2 Toolkit
item.description: Get detailed information and interactions for items.

item.title: Build Creation Tool - Remnant 2 Toolkit
item.description: Create and share your favorite builds with your friends and the community.

item.title: Build Creation Tool - Remnant 2 Toolkit
item.description: Create and share your favorite builds with your friends and the community.

item.title: World Save Archive - Remnant 2 Toolkit
item.description: A collection of curated world saves for apocalypse bosses with specific affixes.

item.title: Toolkit Resources - Remnant 2 Toolkit
item.description: A collection of helpful tools, detailed guides, and third-party projects for Remnant 2.

item.title: Support R2TK - Remnant 2 Toolkit
item.description: Help with the costs of running the Toolkit and keeping it ad-free, plus get some small perks!
